reviewsJson.markdown:
Setup: SXK Hadaly clone, 22ga ss316l 10-wrap, Cellucotton wicking

Testing: Flavorah Arabian Tobacco @1.5% 70/30 1.5mg

Flavor Description: On the inhale, I get a sweet, cooling sensation in my mouth and back of my throat. Not as cool as koolada or menthol, but almost a very light on the menthol menthol cigarette. Not a leafy pipe tobacco, nor a spicy cigar tobacco, I think this is more of a special foreign cigarette flavor. I am struggling to place the flavor other than cooling. Probably nutty? Not super dark, but not light. Rather flat. I think this would be a good flavor to make menthol camels with.

Off-flavors: the Cooling sensation.

Throat hit: none for me.

Uses and pairings: I think this is a good cigarette tobacco, so maybe DNB, and maybe some of the flavorah cigarette tobaccos and menthol, but i wouldn't put this in a pipe mix.

Second Opinions: 
https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/5uvngi/flv_arabian_tobacco/
